member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.Devices.Client.Exceptions.DeviceMessageLockLostException
member.summary: The exception that is thrown when an attempt to communicate with a device fails because the lock token was lost (if the connection is lost and regained for example). This timeout has the same effect as if the message was abandonned.
member.remarks: An abandoned message will be re-enqueued in the per-device queue, and the instance will receive it again. A rejected message will be deleted from the queue and not received again by the device.
